message_1: A manufacturing company has 8 machines that produce a product. Each machine produces a different amount of the product in one hour. The company wants to know which machines to use to produce the most product in 8 hours. They need at least 300 units of the product. What is the maximum number of units the company can produce in 8 hours using at least 3 machines?
message_2: To solve this problem, we need to know the production rate of each machine. Please provide the production rate of each of the 8 machines.
